This is a timelapse video showing how I model a WOODEN FRAMED STRUCTURE (Arbor) in AutoCAD Architecture 2020 / 2021 / 2022 / 2023 / 2024. The strategies used in this video can be used to create various types of wooden structures in AutoCAD, including:

 ‚Ä¢ Pergolas (like the one in this video)
 ‚Ä¢ Roof framing
 ‚Ä¢ Trellis roofing
 ‚Ä¢ Gazebos
 ‚Ä¢ Canopies 
 ‚Ä¢ Arbors
 ‚Ä¢ Slotted ceilings
 ‚Ä¢ Wooden beams
 ‚Ä¢ Etc.

‚ö†Remember that you have the option to reduce the playback speed of this video.
